message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.DS, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the integration of Internet-connected objects into emerging information networks, which is a key aspect of the field of computer networks (cs.NI). The use of cloud computing as a delivery model for IoT applications suggests a possible fit with the sub-category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The development of a tool for discovering and configuring sensors in a smart environment suggests a possible fit with the sub-category of software engineering (cs.SE). The use of a plug-in architecture to address the challenge of heterogeneity suggests a possible fit with the sub-category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the validation of the proposed solution using a test-bed of sensors suggests a possible fit with the sub-category of systems and control (cs.SY).
